title: Pav Bhaji Masala Powder
content:
Ingredients: Coriander seeds - 2 tb sp Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1 tb sp Cloves - 8 to 10 Cinnamon - 3 Cardamom - 3 Bay leaf - 2 to 3 Dry Red chillies - 3 to 5 Pepper corns - 1/2 tb sp (or) pepper powder - 1 tea spoon Dry mango powder/ Amchur powder - 1/2 tb sp Red chilli powder - 1/2 tb sp Turmeric powder - 1 tea spoon Procedure:
  • Heat frying pan on low to medium heat
  • Add coriander seeds, jeera/ cumin seeds, cloves, cinnamon, cardamom, dry Red chillies dry roast all together till color changes to brown and also you can smell the aroma extracts from spices
  • Let it become cool
  • Add all dry roasted spices, turmeric powder,dry mango powder/amchur powder, red chilli powder and pepper powder in mixer grinder
  • Blend it and make smooth powder
  • Pav Bhaji Masala powder ready
